string: According to our initial results, frataxin was determined to be an iron donor
label: background

string: Frataxin has a role in the interaction with the Fe-S cluster biosynthesis components
label: background

string: This finding is different from that in our previous analysis of the original survey data, in which optimized mitochondrial function was observed to be driven by CyaY interaction with its Fe supplier.
label: background

string: Our results were consistent with the findings in the literature that frataxin (CyaY), is determined to be an Fe donor.
label: background

string: Frataxin has been proposed to be either the iron donor for Fe-S cluster biosynthesis or a regulatory protein that inhibits Fe-S cluster formation [11,22].
label: background
